lines.speaker: Heretic Priest
lines.text: Observe not the empty promise of salvation, and drink deeply from the chalice of true dominion. Why fear the fire that grants you still more power?

choices.text: Your creed ends in ruin. We stand with the true Light.
Speak then—how does your ruin spare us from annihilation?

lines.speaker: Heretic Priest
lines.text: “Light?” A flicker dying in the gale of unending war! Your God forsakes you, while I await—arms uncloaked in mercy. Face me, then, if you must.

lines.speaker: Heretic Priest
lines.text: Yield your piety—cast off the yoke of fragile mercy, and ascend upon wings of obsidian. Wield power eternal—or burn within the lies of your scripture.

choices.text: You are a stumbling block to me; you wont tempt me from the light.
Your words... my faith can't be a lie...

lines.speaker: Heretic Priest
lines.text: Seal our bond with more than words. Sacrifice your companions and gain power everlasting.

choices.text: Your power is a lie born of suffering and shackles. I choose the Light.

lines.text: You feel a brand sear across your soul. A dark covenant has been made. [in the upper right corner move the slider to the right to become Converted]

lines: Far be it from a soldier to carry such a burden, rest here.
The heavens cower before the Artillery Witches' roar.
Pilgrim of dust, look: do you thirst for salvation from servitude?
Stand! Kneel no longer and see TRUTH!!
I speak the true gospel now—fire reborn, flesh exalted. Abandon your deathless prayers!
